languages.text: "Я свидетельствую, что Кьява Гамма — мир, отмеченный покровительством {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. С соизволения его мануфакторумы сей колонии населяют ревностные и трудолюбивые духи машин".

traits.locale_text: "Я свидетельствую, что Кьява Гамма — мир, отмеченный покровительством {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. С соизволения его мануфакторумы сей колонии населяют ревностные и трудолюбивые духи машин".

languages.text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s patronage. By His grace, the manufactorums of the colony are inhabited by committed and industrious machine spirits."
languages.original_text: "Я свидетельствую, что Кьява Гамма — мир, отмеченный покровительством {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. С соизволения его мануфакторумы сей колонии населяют ревностные и трудолюбивые духи машин".

traits.locale_text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by Omnissiah's patronage. By his grace, the manufactorums of this colony are inhabited by and committed and industrious machine spirits."

languages.text: «Testifico que Kiava Gamma es un mundo marcado por la ayuda del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Por su gracia, los manufactorums de la colonia están habitados por espíritus máquina dedicados y voluntariosos».
languages.original_text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s patronage. By His grace, the manufactorums of the colony are inhabited by committed and industrious machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: «Testifico que Kiava Gamma es un mundo marcado por la ayuda del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Por su gracia, los manufactorums de la colonia están habitados por espíritus máquina dedicados y voluntariosos».

languages.text: “我可以作证，基亚瓦伽马星受到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的庇护。在祂的恩惠下，殖民地所有的制造工厂都会住满了坚定而勤奋的机魂。”
languages.original_text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s patronage. By His grace, the manufactorums of the colony are inhabited by committed and industrious machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: “我可以作证，基亚瓦伽马星受到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的庇护。在祂的恩惠下，殖民地所有的制造工厂都会住满了坚定而勤奋的机魂。”

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマは、率直に言うと{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}が特別目をかける惑星です。万機神のお恵みのおかげで、コロニーの聖工場には働き者で真面目な機械精霊が住んでいます」
languages.original_text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s patronage. By His grace, the manufactorums of the colony are inhabited by committed and industrious machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマは、率直に言うと{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}が特別目をかける惑星です。万機神のお恵みのおかげで、コロニーの聖工場には働き者で真面目な機械精霊が住んでいます」

languages.text: "Ich sage hiermit aus, dass die Welt Kiava Gamma unter dem Schutz des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} steht. Dank Seiner Gnade arbeiten in den Manufactorien der Kolonie eifrige und strebsame Maschinengeister."
languages.original_text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s patronage. By His grace, the manufactorums of the colony are inhabited by committed and industrious machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sage hiermit aus, dass die Welt Kiava Gamma unter dem Schutz des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} steht. Dank Seiner Gnade arbeiten in den Manufactorien der Kolonie eifrige und strebsame Maschinengeister."

languages.text: « J'atteste que Kiava Gamma est un monde placé sous la protection de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Par Sa grâce, les manufactorums de la colonie sont peuplés d'esprits de la machine dévoués et industrieux. »
languages.original_text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s patronage. By His grace, the manufactorums of the colony are inhabited by committed and industrious machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: « J'atteste que Kiava Gamma est un monde placé sous la protection de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Par Sa grâce, les manufactorums de la colonie sont peuplés d'esprits des machines dévoués et industrieux. »

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'nın {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} hamiliğindeki bir dünya olduğunu tasdik ederim. O'nun lütfu sayesinde, kolonideki manufaktorumlar kendini adamış ve çalışkan makine ruhlarıyla doludur."
languages.original_text: "I testify that Kiava Gamma is a world marked by the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s patronage. By His grace, the manufactorums of the colony are inhabited by committed and industrious machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'nın {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in hamiliğindeki bir dünya olduğunu tasdik edebilirim. O'nun inayetiyle, kolonideki manufaktorumlar kendini adamış ve çalışkan makine ruhlarıyla doludur."
